summary: You are shouting like a true Draugr.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will replace your original voice in **Fus Ro Dah** (Unrelenting Force) and **Iiz Slen Nus** (Ice Form) shouts for a voice of the undead Draugr.
Works for every race and sex.

[color=red][b]See the video for short demonstration.[/b][/color]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L7c4GwE0FfE


Installation Instructions: Place the \"sounds\" folder from the archive inside your skyrim/data folder. Merge if asked.

Please, let me know if there are any problems with this mod.


Please, check out my other mods:
[center]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8038][img]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/3931/coloreddragonscale.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10240][img]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6045/pickupthebones.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1916][img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/923/detailedholdshields.png[/img][/url]

[/center]
author: Dragten
